languages.text: Старшая третьего отряда, что зовется Седой Маттиной, и водила отряды еще в годы, когда нынешние разведчики были сопливыми мальцами.
Captain Mattina, the senior officer of the third unit, known to many as Grey Mattina — she had been leading units back when the current crop of scouts were snot-nosed kids.
languages.original_text: Старшая третьего отряда, что зовется Седой Маттиной, и водила отряды еще в годы, когда нынешние разведчики были сопливыми мальцами.

traits.locale_text: Captain Mattina, the senior officer of the third unit, known to many as Gray Mattina — she had been leading units back when the current crop of scouts were snot-nosed kids.

Captain Mattina, the senior officer of the third unit, known to many as Grey Mattina — she had been leading units back when the current crop of scouts were snot-nosed kids.

languages.text: La capitana Mattina, la oficial de mayor rango de la tercera unidad, conocida como Mattina la Gris porque ya lideraba unidades cuando la remesa actual de exploradores todavía eran unos mocosos.
languages.original_text: Captain Mattina, the senior officer of the third unit, known to many as Grey Mattina — she had been leading units back when the current crop of scouts were snot-nosed kids.

traits.locale_text: La capitana Mattina, la oficial de mayor rango de la tercera unidad, conocida como Mattina la Gris porque ya lideraba unidades cuando la remesa actual de exploradores todavía eran unos mocosos.

languages.text: 马蒂娜上尉，第三小队的高级军官，许多人称她为“灰马”。早在这群侦察兵还是拖着鼻涕的小屁孩时，她就已经是小队领袖了。
languages.original_text: Captain Mattina, the senior officer of the third unit, known to many as Grey Mattina — she had been leading units back when the current crop of scouts were snot-nosed kids.

traits.locale_text: 马蒂娜上尉，第三小队的高级军官，许多人称她为“灰马”。早在这群侦察兵还是拖着鼻涕的小屁孩时，她就已经是小队领袖了。

languages.text: マティナ中隊長は第3部隊の上級士官で、グレイ・マティナという名は多くの人の記憶に刻まれている。彼女は今の偵察兵がハナタレ小僧だったときから部隊を率いていた。
languages.original_text: Captain Mattina, the senior officer of the third unit, known to many as Grey Mattina — she had been leading units back when the current crop of scouts were snot-nosed kids.

traits.locale_text: マティナ中隊長は第3部隊の上級士官で、グレイ・マティナという名は多くの人の記憶に刻まれている。彼女は今の偵察兵がハナタレ小僧だったときから部隊を率いていた。

languages.text: Captain Mattina, die leitende Offizierin der dritten Einheit, vielen bekannt als Graue Mattina – sie hatte schon Einheiten geführt, als die aktuellen Späher noch rotznasige Kinder waren.
languages.original_text: Captain Mattina, the senior officer of the third unit, known to many as Grey Mattina — she had been leading units back when the current crop of scouts were snot-nosed kids.

traits.locale_text: Captain Mattina, die leitende Offizierin der dritten Einheit, vielen bekannt als Graue Mattina – sie hatte schon Einheiten geführt, als die aktuellen Späher noch rotznasige Kinder waren.

languages.text: La capitaine Mattina, officière supérieure de la troisième unité, que beaucoup surnommaient « Mattina la Grise » parce qu'elle assumait déjà un rôle de leader quand les éclaireurs d'aujourd'hui étaient encore en culottes courtes.
languages.original_text: Captain Mattina, the senior officer of the third unit, known to many as Grey Mattina — she had been leading units back when the current crop of scouts were snot-nosed kids.

traits.locale_text: La capitaine Mattina, officière supérieure de la troisième unité, que beaucoup surnommaient « Mattina la Grise » parce qu'elle assumait déjà un rôle de leader quand les éclaireurs d'aujourd'hui étaient encore en culottes courtes.

languages.text: "Gri Mattina" lakabıyla ün salmış, üçüncü birimin kıdemli subayı Yüzbaşı Mattina. Kendisi, bugünkü erler daha beyinleri burunlarından akan çocuklarken bile birimlere önderlik ediyormuş.
languages.original_text: Captain Mattina, the senior officer of the third unit, known to many as Grey Mattina — she had been leading units back when the current crop of scouts were snot-nosed kids.

traits.locale_text: Yüzbaşı Mattina. Üçüncü birimin kıdemli subayıydı ve "Gri Mattina" lakabıyla ün salmıştı. Bu kadın birliklere önderlik etmeye başladığında birlikler, beyinleri burunlarından akan mızmızlardan oluşuyordu.
